abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32749010, pmid32657586, pmid32761999, pmid32749712, pmid32745196, pmid32761546, pmid32744907, pmid32743940, pmid32563187, pmid32752947, pmid32749486, pmid32761973, pmid32761244
